title: Fake Fur
sinopse: “When I was a junior in high school, I always thought about kissing someone. 15-year-old boys always pretend like that, right? One Valentine’s Day, I received a letter with chocolate…from a guy! The whole class was thrown into an uproar.” A collection of sweet stories like this one, Fake Fur takes you on the rocky road of love. (Source: DMP)
